title: Ghostbusters, Ghibli and new Beyonce - today's pop culture LIVE | Culture | The Guardian
summary: things to do ( or look at ) tonight .
absolutely not at all crazy like a fox .

documents.title: things to do ( or look at ) tonight
text: last post of the day folks and you know what that means repurposing of old content from our magazine !
oh he only wants to play with you !

amongst tonight 's tv highlights include : italian mobsters , first world war reflections and , naturally , michael portillo on a train and music wise , if you 're a fan of metal , hardcore punk crossovers , then tonight 's your lucky night !
where have all the punters gone ?
thom yorke turned late night dj at the weekend , playing an unannounced set at a festival .
the thing is that that festival was leopallooza , a tiny little affair in cornwall and barely anyone saw it ( never mind recorded it on their phone ) .

as the evening standard quotes one crowd member as saying : he 's probably the most influential artist of the past decade and here he is prepping to play to half a dozen drunk hippies '' wonder what scott tenneman would have to say about that ?

jack white has a tough year , what with being mistaken for an 'asshole ' by the black keys and , also , this : oh boo hoo hoo august begins with some good news for the defiantly retrogressive genius however as his latest album , lazaretto , has become the biggest selling vinyl lp since pearl jam 's vitalogy in 1994 .
sure , he only had to sell 60,000 copies to achieve that feat , but it 's nearly twice as much as the arctic monkeys managed .
so that 's something

documents.title: absolutely not at all crazy like a fox
text: a face like the side of a bus megan fox 's glittering cv is about to get even more glittererier when she stars alongside a green screen in teenage mutant ninja turtles .
but some people have been a bit sniffy about the film , and that 's caused megan to issue a statement that 's both contradictory and just a little aggressive .
we 're happy to reprint it here : let me tell you something about those people , '' said fox .
how much money did transformers 4 make ?
exactly .
those people can complain - they all go to the theatre .
they 're gon na love it - and if they do n't love it , they can fuck off , and that 's the end of that . ''

documents.title: if you like german whips , you 'll love one two drinks !
text: i mean that in a literal sense , because all drivers are drinkers .
not at the same time , that would be illegal , but after , in order to numb the pain of having sat in traffic for two thirds of their lives .
in other news , the guy who did that catchy little grime number about driving cars of teutonic extraction is back with another one .
this one 's about how people get argy after a bevvy or two and is naturally set to a quasi-classical music backing .

documents.title: perhaps the finest celebrity scent ever flogged ?
text: tara reid , the star of cinematic classics sharknado and sharknado 2 ( the second one ) , has looked at herself , thought 'how can i turn my unexpected infamy into cold hard cash ? '
and come up with the only correct answer - invent a perfume .
bringing together the two things she 's known for , being pretty and starring in a crap shark movie , her scent is called 'shark by tara ' .
because nothing says beauty like an aquatic predator .
would you be smiling

documents.title: is corporate sponsored content ace , or what ?
text: watch this video of jude law doing a song and dance routine to try and win a boat and i 'm sure you 'll agree that when you put creatives and brands together what you get is memorable art and not some kind of glam rubbish that has no point to it whatsoever other than to reinforce the idea that spending money makes you happy .
dance jude , dance !

documents.title: beyonce 's new elevator music
text: is there a moment in the waking day when beyonce is not getting photographed ?
beyonce has dropped a new track , a remix of flawless we think you 'll agree the images on this ripped vid leave something to be desired it features nicki minaj .
it samples outkast cor , what a classic it also discusses matters of contemporary importance , like 'what did happen in that lift during that thing with solange , jay-z , something something ? '
the answer , says bey , is simple : of course sometimes shit goes down when there 's a billion dollars on an elevator . ''
i do n't understand how that explains things at all
arcade fire cover axel f with wind instruments ooooooh diss this song is called f axl .
it was written about axl rose and lots of people do n't realise that '' .
no it 's not mate , it 's about this guy : i have to talk to victor , it 's vey vey important

bulletin.text: The aim of the game is to post new music, video and 'words' that illustrate the best and most creative output in culture.
Failing that we'll have some trailers for Sharknado 3.
Keep in touch in the comments or via Twitter @twitterid.
Beyonce releases 'Flawless' remix, talks that elevator incident.
